name: vamp
description: Canary test/release and autoscaling platform for DC/OS
preInstallNotes:
In order to run Vamp you need to specify few parameters like connection to Elasticsearch, Logstash etc.

See installation instruction at http://vamp.io/documentation/installation/dcos/
postInstallNotes:
Vamp has been successfully installed!

You can access Vamp at
 **`https://<dcos_url>/service/vamp/`**

See [our website](http://vamp.io/documentation/installation/dcos/) for documentation.
